thread.section_title: Blue Tomato Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Blue Tomato | www.blue-tomato.com
thread.title: Ioanna Hosu
thread.title_full: Blue Tomato bewertet von Ioanna Hosu

author: Ioanna Hosu
title: Ioanna Hosu
text:
Me and my boyfriend made a few orders from them, and they always delivered the products on time.
My last order was made from 3 items, and one item was not immediately available, and they split the order in two, so I could get some of the products as soon as it can be. Finally, the delay of the third product was not that big, and I received my all products at the same time, and in their estimated time.
I also skyped them to ask some question, and they replied within the same day.
My experience with them was great! I do recommend them!
Thank you Blue-Tomato!!! I will definitely come back!
